mapper.select: SELECT b.restaurant_id AS restaurantId, b.business_id AS businessId, b.business_tel AS businessPhone, b.business_name AS businessName, b.business_number AS businessNumber, r.place AS storeName FROM business_user b JOIN restaurant r ON b.restaurant_id = r.restaurant_id WHERE business_id = #{businessId}

SELECT r.reservation_id AS resvId, b.restaurant_id AS restaurantId, r.reservation_date AS resvDate, r.reservation_time AS resvTime, r.count_people AS headCount, r.reservation_state AS status, n.user_id AS userId, n.user_name AS name, n.user_tel AS phone FROM reservation r JOIN business_user b ON b.restaurant_id = r.restaurant_id JOIN normal_user n ON r.user_id = n.user_id WHERE b.business_id = #{businessId} ORDER BY r.reservation_date DESC, r.reservation_time;

SELECT r.reservation_id AS resvId, b.restaurant_id AS restaurantId, r.reservation_date AS resvDate, r.reservation_time AS resvTime, r.count_people AS headCount, r.reservation_state AS status, n.user_id AS userId, n.user_name AS name, n.user_tel AS phone FROM reservation r JOIN business_user b ON b.restaurant_id = r.restaurant_id JOIN normal_user n ON r.user_id = n.user_id WHERE b.business_id = #{businessId} AND r.reservation_date = #{resvDate} ORDER BY r.reservation_time;

SELECT rv.review_idx AS reviewIdx, b.restaurant_id AS restaurantId, rv.reservation_id AS reservationId, b.business_name AS storeName, rv.rating AS rating, rv.img_url AS imgUrl, rv.user_id AS userId, rv.comment AS comment, rv.create_date AS createDate, rv.update_date AS updateDate, rv.reply_content AS replyContent, rv.reply_date AS replyDate, CASE WHEN rv.reply_content IS NULL THEN false ELSE true END AS replied FROM review rv JOIN reservation r ON r.reservation_id = rv.reservation_id JOIN business_user b ON b.restaurant_id = r.restaurant_id WHERE b.business_id = #{businessId} ORDER BY rv.create_date DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review rv JOIN reservation r ON r.reservation_id = rv.reservation_id JOIN business_user b ON b.restaurant_id = r.restaurant_id WHERE b.business_id = #{businessId}
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET reply_content = #{replyContent}, reply_date = NOW() WHERE review_idx = #{reviewIdx};
mapper.select: SELECT r.reservation_id AS resvId, b.restaurant_id AS restaurantId, r.reservation_date AS resvDate, r.reservation_time AS resvTime, r.count_people AS headCount, r.reservation_state AS status, n.user_id AS userId, n.user_name AS name, n.user_tel AS phone FROM reservation r JOIN business_user b ON b.restaurant_id = r.restaurant_id JOIN normal_user n ON r.user_id = n.user_id WHERE b.business_id = #{businessId} AND r.reservation_date = #{resvDate} AND r.reservation_state != '취소' ORDER BY r.reservation_time;

SELECT restaurant_id AS restaurantId, business_id AS businessId, business_pwd AS businessPwd, business_name AS businessName, business_tel AS businessPhone, business_number AS businessNumber, status AS status, delete_reserve_date AS deleteReserveDate FROM business_user WHERE business_id = #{businessId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM reservation WHERE restaurant_id = (SELECT restaurant_id FROM business_user WHERE business_id = #{businessId})
DELETE FROM restaurant WHERE restaurant_id = (SELECT restaurant_id FROM business_user WHERE business_id = #{businessId})
